title: Morning Joe 5/14/21
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Thursday that people who are fully vaccinated against Covid-19 no longer need to wear masks or physically distance — whether indoors or outdoors in most circumstances.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
